availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David W. Owen (Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer. Crittenden County, Kentucky, native. Son of Anne M. Owen. Married to Nancy Threlkeld Owen in Crittenden County, Kentucky, on September 14, 1853. Father of William Owen, Webb Owen, and Paton Owen. Laborer in Crittenden County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Crittenden County, Kentucky, in 1856. Farmer in Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, District 1, p. 244B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, District 2, p. 232.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Hamilton County, District 7, p. 601A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994045, Crittenden County Births.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, Film 000558428.
"David W. Owen (1833-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial 5585013, accessed April 11, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5585013.
